text:
@marcorubio Had the COVID-19 Promoter-in-Chief encouraged the wearing of masks, we wouldn"t have millions of Americans infected & nearly 130,000 fatalities. 

The lethal Trump admin doesn't value American lives - surpassing Vietnam war deaths, & and aiming to surpass WWII deaths.
